notes.text:
This update for c-ares fixes the following issues:

  Updated to version 1.19.0:

  - CVE-2022-4904: Fixed missing string length check in config_sortlist() (bsc#1208067).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: A flaw was found in the c-ares package. The ares_set_sortlist is missing checks about the validity of the input string, which allows a possible arbitrary length stack overflow. This issue may cause a denial of service or a limited impact on confidentiality and integrity.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
